subtitle1: Add annotations and notes to improve reading efficiency. Export notes and have them anywhere, so you can check them on the go
subtitle2: Powerful parsing engine that perfectly supports ePub2 and ePub3, Koodo Reader support Window, macOS and Web
subtitle3: Export book files, notes, reading progress, and anything to a .zip file! and people could use our icon manager app to import it with one click.
subtitle4: No matter on a browser or a desktop app, we try our best to provide you with refreshing and comfortable reading experience.
